nodes.text: The Azzameen family conducted a mission to recapture the family datacore, which had been discarded and transported to Junkyard Control from their home, the orbital station Azzameen Home Base, following the station's capture by the Galactic Empire. The family required the datacore for the information it contained regarding the Empire and an Imperial-aligned trading company, Viraxo Industries, in order to conduct further missions against both factions.
